about_the_game:
This is a large-scale contemporary science fiction harem 3000 love development visual interactive novel.
After playing the game, you can contact customer service email for free update methods

However, in an accident, you receive a magical button of love bestowed upon you by God. When you press the button on anyone, they will agree to whatever you say, and even allow them to break through human potential and achieve things that ordinary people cannot.
But if the use of buttons has consequences that are not conducive to sustainable social development, the buttons will be recycled and you will lose everything you have gained from them.

This is the sequel of “OKEverything: My story with 3000 beauties PART02”. You were almost killed in an assassination attempt and unfortunately became paralyzed. You used a magical button to escape death and evolved into a super digital life form, engaging in a full-scale confrontation with the world's most evil group, "FXGROUP". Although you had already mastered almost invincible super power and the ability to create clones, you found that the organizational network of "FXGROUP" was already densely distributed in various fields such as politics, military, business, education, and media in various countries around the world, and could not be easily attacked by force. Based on the character data in classic martial arts novels and myths, you constructed the Emei Sect leader Zhou Ziruo, the female version of the Three Kingdoms hero Cao Cao, the super strategist Zhuge Liang, the founder of the Han Dynasty Liu Bang, as well as the Qitian Great Saint Sun Wukong, and a series of others. Super clones began to develop meticulous plans and infiltrate into the vast organizational network of "FXGROUP", Attempting to disintegrate it from within…

Introduction to the Background of the Story：
When you enter the story world of Okeverything, you will play the role of a righteous, talented, lecherous, unlucky, and bloodthirsty 25-year-old virgin.
I have been boasting to my classmates since I started college at the age of 18 that I will definitely find a girlfriend to have my first sexual encounter this year, but I have failed every year. Although I have good abilities, I often miss opportunities due to poor luck, and I often get injured accidentally when going out. I can't even pass the driver's license exam…

During the development of the story,
May engage in love interactions with beautiful women of different skin colors, ages (18-60 years old), professions, personalities, and identities in various incredible scenes such as sea, land, and air…

Special attention: Although there are magical buttons, even a slight mistake can lead to negative consequences, such as BAD ENDING... Remember not to try to clock in all BAD ENDING, as it may take a lot of your time.

content_descriptors.notes: This (visual interactive novel) game uses supernatural sci-fi items that lead to involuntary behavior, BDSM, and even supernatural dangerous behaviors that exceed human limits.Described organized crime and violent behavior

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You used a magical button to evolve into a super digital life form, and referenced classic martial arts novels and myths to construct super clones such as the Monkey King, infiltrating the vast organizational network of the world's evil group "FXGROUP" and attempting to dismantle it from within
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
